histogram.name: Borealis.Install.NumAttempts
histogram.summary: The number of Borealis installation attempts. This is recorded each time a user tries to install Borealis. Specifically, this metric is recorded when a user clicks on the install or retry button in the Borealis installer. It is intended that this metric is compared against the sum of Borealis.Install.Result as a way to measure silent failures.

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.OverallTime
histogram.summary: Time taken for a successful installation. An install starts when the "install" or "retry" installer buttons are clicked and ends when the install completes successfully, at which point this metric is recorded. Note that retries are considered as their own individual installation attempts.

histogram.name: Borealis.Install.Result
histogram.summary: The installation result, for example, a successful install, a cancelled install, or an error. This is recorded after an installation attempt has ended.

histogram.name: Borealis.Stability
histogram.summary: A record of post-startup failures in Borealis components. Buckets are recorded to when we become aware that the corresponding component has failed.

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.NumAttempts
histogram.summary: Recording every attempt to start Borealis (via the UI).

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.OverallTime
histogram.summary: Recording the time taken for each successful attempt to start Borealis (via the UI).

histogram.name: Borealis.Startup.Result
histogram.summary: Recording the result of each attempt to start Borealis, whether it was successful or the error that it faced.
